nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze

Class KeyTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Tile
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.KeyTile

  • public class KeyTile
extends Tile
    From handout: Actors can move onto those tiles. If Chap moves onto such a tile, he picks up the key with this colour, once this is done, the tile turns into a free tile.
